b. Zachary realizes that both he and Shirley have grown individually and as a team through this collaboration.
c. He intends to maintain this professional relationship even after the project.
d. Zachary spends long hours researching and preparing his presentation.
e. He spends more time interacting with Shirley during project meetings.
f. He openly shares his resources and knowledge with Shirley.
g. He proposes additional meetings and is highly active during discussions.
h. He feels a profound sense of accomplishment and camaraderie.
